Prize Wheel

A random selector prize wheel that goes clackety clack.

Completed on 10/12/2017.

The wheel was cut by mounting it on a pin on a sled then rotating it round cutting the corners off until there's no corners left.

Tada!

I drove screws in to divide each segment, and pressure fitted some skateboard bearings in the middle for it to spin on.

Simple frame construction, cut the angles with the mitre guage on the table saw. The joints are held with glue and screws.

Some threaded rod is epoxied in for the wheel to mount on.

A bit of plastic from a bottle works great as the stopper.

Clackety clackety clack.
